spec_data.Name: perl-Padre
spec_data.Description:
Padre is a text editor aimed to be an IDE for Perl.
The application maintains its configuration information
in a directory called .padre.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:54:38 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl Application Development and Refactoring Environment
